name: Outlook.com Sleek & Tidy
description:
A combination of:

Outlook.com Tidy v4.0.3 2016-07-27 (CC BY-SA)
https://userstyles.org/styles/2920/outlook-com-tidy

＆

Sleek style for Outlook.com 2017-05-17 (CC BY-NC-SA)
https://userstyles.org/styles/109751/sleek-style-for-outlook-com

- Fixing Tidy's sections
- Adding subfolder support to Sleek style for Outlook.com
- Adding support for Outlook 365
- Beautifying the CSS
- Supporting any language

Have an issue or want to contribute?
additional_info: Update 8 (2017-06-18) - Optimize SVG saving 204 characters. - Remove unclickable areas in the folder pane. Fixing #14 - Don't apply style to OneDrive. Fixing #11 Previous updates ／ All releases

discussions.name: Please add support for the new Outlook.com beta (August 2017)
